alert.note: Alert for Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued November 18 at 1:32AM PST until November 18 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...An extended period of stagnant air, with light winds and little vertical mixing. * WHERE...In Idaho, Lower Treasure Valley ID and Upper Weiser River. In Oregon, Oregon Lower Treasure Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Periods of air stagnation can lead to the buildup of pollutants near the surface.
info.instruction: An Air Stagnation Advisory concerns itself with meteorological conditions only. For more information on air pollution in Idaho, visit website www.deq.idaho.gov. If possible, reduce or eliminate activities that contribute to air pollution, such as outdoor burning, and the use of residential wood burning devices. Reduce vehicle trips and vehicle idling as much as possible.
